front.title: 4-octet AS number application scenario for stable network operation

abstract.t: This document is designed to help organizations in their use of 4-octet AS numbers in the future by checking the possibility ofinteraction between 2-octet AS numbers and 4-octet AS numbers foreach scenario, based on the compatibility of heterogeneous equipmentused in the actual network related to 4-octet AS numbers, and byverifying the interoperability of networks specified in each scenario- before using 4-octet AS numbers, before applying 4-octet ASnumbers, as well as the influence on service traffic at the time ofinteraction.
